Name: wordlists with phonetic transcriptions)
Description: Wordlists with phonetic transcriptions in which sound segments can be readily described by the CLTS system

Name: large wordlists with at least 250 concepts
Description: Wordlists with large form inventories in which at least 250 concepts can be linked to the Concepticon

Name: wordlists with phonetic transcriptions and cognate sets
Description: Wordlists with phonetic transcriptions in which cognate sets have been annotated (a subset of LexiCore)

Name: wordlists with phonetic transcriptions, cognate sets, and proto-languages
Description: Wordlists with phonetic transcriptions in which cognate sets have been annotated and which contain one or more ancestral languages whose forms are proto-forms from which forms in the descendant languages can be derived (a subset of CogCore)
